title: Patterns for Enterprise Architecting
description: Fundamental aspects of pattern methodologies and reuse, requirements, design and architecture patterns, patterns for service-oriented architectures, enterprise application and integration patterns, e-business patterns, event-driven architectures and patterns for complex event processing, process patterns, architecture evolution and refactoring using patterns. This course will meet from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. every alternating Friday and Saturday. Prerequisites: enrollment in MAS-AESE, AESE 278B-C-D, or instructor approval.
